Tw√≥j zakres obowiƒÖzk√≥w
Scrums. We'll start every day with a scrum, working together to understand responsibilities, identify issues, and communicate priorities.
Collaboration and Communication. You'll be the point person for developers and operations when they need to find a solution quickly. You'll listen to their needs, find a solution and share it. You're comfortable presenting to leadership everything from system designs to new ideas for technology to production incidents.
Code Review. Working in two-week sprints, you'll ensure that code runs through automation scripts with no errors and can automate scale for demand Support. Installation, configuration and administration of various Payroll ,HR, Social Security applications
CI/CD. You'll be part of the team that designs and implements automation to our existing CI/CD tools to help usable products get to market faster through accurate automation.
Variety of work. There is no typical day. You will support applications, checking if something is not working and writing the code it takes to fix it. You must be nimble, adaptable, and flexible.
Change. You're comfortable working on products with old and new technologies. Inevitable challenges will arise, and we'll rely on you to look for a solution. Fail fast, fail safely.

employer_name: Flying Bisons sp. z o.o.About the company
responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
The Flying Digital Content is a part of Flying Bisons Group, specialising in photo and video content production. We collaborate with well-known brands such as HBO Max, Sizeer, 50style, Space Range, My To Sukces, and Glo. Do you know artists like Mata, Kizo, Bia≈Ças, Sok√≥≈Ç, Malik Montana, and Pezet? If your answer is yes, you probably could see our video productions! The portfolio of our clients is getting bigger, and our team of A-players, too!
We're building a curated network of talented freelance Angular Developers that we can call upon for existing and future projects. When you apply to join our freelancer base, you will be evaluated and kept on file. You may not be contacted immediately. When a project matches your specific expertise, you‚Äôll be invited to participate and can choose to accept or decline based on your availability. If you're interested in becoming part of our talent pool, please submit your CV. We‚Äôll get in touch as soon as an opportunity aligned with your skills arises.
Are you self-driven, and dependable professional? If so, we look forward to hearing from you!
requirements_section:
Our requirements
3+ years of commercial experience in Angular development (experience with or a minimum working knowledge of Angular 19)
Proficiency in RxJS and the ability to effectively use reactive programming patterns
Experience with Angular Material or other component libraries
Knowledge of TypeScript, HTML, and CSS (Sass)
Familiarity with Git version control system
Very good command of Polish and English
Optional
Experience with Nx or similar tools
Knowledge of Tailwind CSS
Hands-on experience with Signals and their practical usage
Experience with state management libraries such as NgRx (Signal Store), Akita, or other Redux-based tools
Understanding of WCAG standards and ability to implement accessibility guidelines
Familiarity with Storybook and experience in building and managing Design Systems
description_block:
Flying Bisons sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Flying Bisons is a leading Digital Consulting & Delivery company based in the heart of Europe, Warsaw. Our mission is to help our clients to Unleash Digital Potential‚Ñ¢. We discover, define, design, and develop world-class digital products that drive business results for our clients, shaping digital experiences for millions of people around the world.
We stand out due to our end-to-end process that allows us to approach each and every challenge with confidence that we can deliver the best results. Our expertise includes Research, Digital Strategy, Branding, Content (Written, Photos, Videos), Product Design, Web & Mobile Development, Data Analytics & AI.
Join our 120-people team to co-create industry-defining products and heart-racing experiences for the biggest brands (Mercedes AMG, IKEA, KFC, eObuwie, ≈ªabka, Sanofi, Zain) and disruptive startups (like Booksy, Nethone, Telemedi, or DevSkiller)!
additional_module_section:
Why work with us?
Unleash Your Potential: We don't just encourage growth; we're your partners! Our feedback culture is as regular as your morning coffee.
Routine feedback meetings, feedback workshops, and a well-defined career path ensure a transparent way for continuous development.
Elevate with Flying Spirit: We value a flat structure, allowing you to work directly with experts and report to leaders who are hands-on in projects.
Here, synergetic teamwork is the way we thrive.
Knowledge-sharing meetups, consultations with managers, regular team integrations, and a culture of support are how we roll to provide an environment where you want to grow.
Thriving Partnerships, Boundless Opportunities: With diverse clients and a team, our work is beyond borders.
Whether your location is Poland or Saudi Arabia, you might work for special projects in another country or integrate and network with industry specialists.
Our people: Check our Instagram or YouTube channel to see who the Bisons are!

employer_name: CBRE Business Services Organisation Sp. z o.o.About the company
benefit_titles: ['sharing the costs of sports activities', 'private medical care', 'sharing the costs of foreign language classes', 'sharing the costs of professional training & courses', 'life insurance', 'remote work opportunities', 'flexible working time', 'fruits', 'integration events', 'corporate sports team', 'video games at work', 'coffee / tea', 'leisure zone', 'employee referral program', 'charity initiatives', 'career coach care', 'talent program', 'international enviroment', 'office close to the metro station', 'hybrid work']
responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Design, develop, and optimize complex T-SQL queries, stored procedures, views, and functions for enterprise-grade property and finance systems.
Maintain and enhance our reporting database environment, including ETL pipelines and reporting layers.
Engage with business stakeholders (finance, property management, property management accounting) to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
Ensure adherence to best practices in SQL coding standards, version control, and inline documentation.
Focus on query performance tuning, indexing strategies, and execution plan analysis to ensure optimal database performance.
Proactively identify data quality issues, schema design improvements, and opportunities for automation.
Participate in code reviews, ensuring maintainability, scalability, and adherence to security and governance standards.
Collaborate with analysts, software developers, and data engineers to support wider data initiatives.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Expert-level proficiency in T-SQL and SQL Server environments (SSMS, SSRS, SSIS preferred).
Strong understanding of database normalization, indexing, query optimization, and execution plans.
Proven experience working with large-scale reporting databases, ideally within the property or real estate sector.
Ability to understand and challenge business requirements, translating them into efficient and effective SQL solutions.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills‚Äîable to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical users.
Familiarity with accounting principles or property management systems (e.g., Yardi, MRI, Qube) is advantageous.
Experience with data warehousing concepts, dimensional modeling, or OLAP/OLTP structures, cloud solutions like Snowflake, AWS, Azure is a plus.
ETL tools experience (Alterxy, Savant, PowerQuery, SnapLogic)
Highly self-motivated, detail-oriented, and committed to producing clean, well-commented code.
Organized, able to work independently and effectively manage workload
Ability to exercise judgment based on the analysis of multiple sources of information
Optional
Experience in Agile environments and working in cross-functional product teams.
Understanding of data governance, GDPR, and security in database environments.
Comfortable working in fast-paced environments with changing priorities.
Demonstrated ability to exceed client expectations through proactive problem-solving and strong stakeholder engagement.
Technical experience of MRI, Yardi, YSR reporting skills or another Property Management Systems
Programming experience in Python
offered_section:
What we offer
Stable employment conditions - Work based on employment contract in the international company with stable position on the labour market
Career advancement program - A chance to learn from the Best by attending internal courses and taking part in international programs that will enable you to travel as well as experience how we work in different places in the world. Additionally, we offer a career coach advisory.
Workplace Cultur - Support from our side in terms of working from home as well as comfortable office with chillout room, entertainment room, creative labs and beautiful terrace are making our office a place you want to be. We are well located nearby Wilanowska metro station.
Wellbeing actions - Environment where we care about your wellbeing by health and leisure initiatives (sport interest groups)
Making a Change in the Word surrounding you - Occasion to make an impact by taking part in our initiatives (CSR, ECO friendly approach)
Attractive package of benefits - Private medical healthcare, life insurance, multisport card and MORE
International Environment - Experience growing in multilingual community where diversity is cherished
description_block:
CBRE Business Services Organisation Sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
CBRE Business Services Organisation (CBRE BSO) is a part of CBRE Group, Inc. (NYSE:CBRE), a Fortune 500 and S&P 500 company headquartered in Dallas, is the world‚Äôs largest commercial real estate services and investment firm (based on 2023 revenue). The company has more than 130,000 employees (including Turner & Townsend employees) serving clients in more than 100 countries. CBRE serves a diverse range of clients with an integrated suite of services, including facilities, transaction and project management; property management; investment management; appraisal and valuation; property leasing; strategic consulting; property sales; mortgage services and development services. Please visit our website at www.cbre.com We routinely post important information on our website, including corporate and investor presentations and financial information. We intend to use our website as a means of disclosing material, non-public information and for complying with our disclosure obligations under Regulation FD. Such disclosures will be included in the Investor Relations section of our website at https://ir.cbre.com Accordingly, investors should monitor such portion of our website, in addition to following our press releases, Securities and Exchange Commission filings and public conference calls and webcasts.
additional_module_section:
Why CBRE Business Services Organization (BSO)
When you join CBRE, you become part of the global leader in commercial real estate services and investment that helps businesses and people thrive. We are dynamic problem solvers and forward-thinking professionals who create significant impact. Our collaborative culture is built on our shared values ‚Äî respect, integrity, service and excellence ‚Äî and we value the diverse perspectives, backgrounds and skillsets of our people. At CBRE, you have the opportunity to realize your full potential.
Our Values in Hiring
At CBRE, we are committed to fostering a culture where everyone feels they belong. We value diverse perspectives and experiences, and we welcome all applications.

description_block:
BIT BY BIT Sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
BitByBit Sp. z o.o. is a company specializing in advanced IT solutions for the space sector. Our software supports the management and monitoring of space missions, serving as a key component of the ground segment. We collaborate with the European Space Agency, research institutions, and leading entities in the space sector, delivering innovative solutions in data processing, system optimization, and standardization of space mission management.
Due to constant development and new opportunities related to the project, we are looking for passionate software engineers who are willing to work in the space industry.
The European Space Agency, Airbus, Terma, SpaceBel, and OHB are among our clients.
additional_module_section: Interested? Don‚Äôt hesitate and apply, maybe together we will explore the universe!

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Analyse, understand business and technical requirements and work with clients across different domains and industries
Produce high-quality design deliverables that describe how the solution will accommodate business and technical requirements
Design, develop, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code using the best practices and design patterns
Conduct unit and manual testing and deliver high-quality solutions
Identify bottlenecks, bugs and devise solutions to troubleshoot and address issues.
Work in an agile, international environment with experienced and skilled colleagues in Warsaw and Europe
Plan and organize your own work and accurately report issues and progress in a timely manner
You will get a chance to work with different programming languages and technologies as those vary from project to project, a large part of our tech stack is Java (Java 11/17/21, Spring/Spring Boot, React, NodeJS, Hibernate)
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Graduate (Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs Degree) of Computer Science or other related numerate discipline
Have at least 1 - 3 years of commercial Java development experience after graduation
Good English skills, both spoken and written
Strong understanding of object-oriented programming and data modelling
Familiar with various design, architectural patterns and modern system development
Open towards and able to quickly learn new technologies
offered_section:
What we offer
Scandinavian work environment
Medical Insurance, Life Insurance, Multisport Card
English and Danish language lessons
Drinks, snacks & fruit available at the office
Career development programme for each employee and regular feedback
Internal and external training and certifications
International cooperation with colleagues from Denmark, the Netherlands, Norway, the UK and Vietnam
Attractive office with a view and great location in Warsaw (Metro Wilanowska)
description_block:
Netcompany Poland sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Netcompany was founded in 2000 with the headquarters in Copenhagen, Denmark. Today, we are an international company with more than 8200 employees working from over 10 locations. We serve a wide array of customers in their digital transformation journeys in public and private sectors across Europe.
We are excited by the challenge of doing things differently. At Netcompany we rely on one another and we develop quickly. We are team players. We change societies by creating life-changing IT solutions for variety of customers ‚Äì from small private companies to large projects in the public sector. Our culture builds on low bureaucracy with a strong focus on high agility and flexibility.
Our culture emphasizes minimal bureaucracy. Take a look at some of our impactful projects here: https://netcompany.com/cases/
As we prepare for new ventures, we are seeking ambitious individuals to join us on this journey.
We are excited by the challenge of doing things differently. At Netcompany we rely on one another and we develop quickly. We are team players. We change societies by creating life-changing IT solutions for variety of customers ‚Äì from small private companies to large projects in the public sector. Our culture builds on low bureaucracy with a strong focus on high agility and flexibility.
additional_module_section:
Be a part of an inclusive community
At Netcompany, we prioritise community highly. We actively promote an open and welcoming work culture that is built on collaboration and trust, and where there is always room for mutual sparring and support.
It is part of our culture and values that all employees, irrespective of backgrounds, identities, and experiences, are met with understanding and respect, as well as equal opportunities for development and well-being.
You will have the opportunity to learn and collaborate with colleagues from various cultures and nationalities, as we are an international company with offices in many countries.
We provide a shared environment where we engage with each other across departments and projects. Additionally, we offer a wide range of social and professional events that provide you with the best opportunities to expand and build a network already early in your career.

employer_name: CQURE SP√ì≈ÅKA Z OGRANICZONƒÑ ODPOWIEDZIALNO≈öCIƒÑAbout the company
responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Proactively hunt for advanced persistent threats (APTs), malware, and insider threats within enterprise environments.
Analyze security telemetry from various sources, including SIEM, EDR, XDR, and cloud security tools to detect and investigate anomalies.
Develop and optimize hunting queries, detections, and automation in SIEMs and threat-hunting platforms.
Conduct forensic investigations on suspicious activity, using logs, memory analysis, and behavioral analytics.
Leverage threat intelligence to correlate security incidents and improve detection strategies.
Collaborate with incident response (IR) teams to remediate and mitigate threats.
Identify gaps in security monitoring, recommend improvements, and implement threat detection enhancements.
Research and implement new hunting methodologies based on emerging threats and attacker tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs).
Develop detection rules, scripts, and custom SIEM queries to improve security monitoring.
Document threat-hunting findings, create reports, and present to stakeholders.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
‚Ä¢ 6+ years of experience in providing cybersecurity services or training,
‚Ä¢ Expert level IT skills and knowledge (cybersecurity),
‚Ä¢ Vast experience in IT infrastructure management, deployment and testing,
‚Ä¢ Interest in IT security, cloud solutions, network security and server administration technologies,
‚Ä¢ Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology or related field of study,
‚Ä¢ English (at least B2 level).
Work Environment & Expectations:
‚Ä¢ Ability to work in a 24/7 SOC or threat-hunting team as required.
‚Ä¢ Flexibility to adapt to evolving cyber threats and changing hunting techniques.
‚Ä¢ Strong desire for continuous learning and staying updated with cyber threat intelligence.
SIEM Platforms (Experience with 2 or more is preferred):
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Sentinel
‚Ä¢ Splunk Enterprise Security
‚Ä¢ IBM QRadar
‚Ä¢ Crowdstrike solutions
‚Ä¢ ArcSight (OpenText Security Operations)
‚Ä¢ Chronicle SIEM (Google Cloud)
‚Ä¢ LogRhythm
‚Ä¢ Securonix Next-Gen SIEM
Threat Hunting & Detection Platforms:
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Defender Threat Hunting (Advanced Hunting - KQL)
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Defender XDR
‚Ä¢ CrowdStrike Falcon Insight
‚Ä¢ Palo Alto Cortex XDR
‚Ä¢ SentinelOne Singularity
‚Ä¢ Elastic Security (Kibana queries for threat hunting)
‚Ä¢ VMware Carbon Black Response
‚Ä¢ RSA NetWitness
Cloud Security & Monitoring:
‚Ä¢ Azure Security Center & Defender for Cloud
‚Ä¢ AWS GuardDuty & Security Hub
‚Ä¢ Google Chronicle & Security Command Center
‚Ä¢ Cisco SecureX
Threat Intelligence & Forensic Tools:
‚Ä¢ MITRE ATT&CK Framework (for mapping TTPs)
‚Ä¢ MISP (Malware Information Sharing Platform)
‚Ä¢ Wireshark (Network Traffic Analysis)
‚Ä¢ Volatility etc.
‚Ä¢ Sysmon, Windows Event Logs (Log Analysis)
Optional
GIAC Certified Threat Intelligence Analyst (GCTI)
GIAC Certified Incident Handler (GCIH)
GIAC Security Operations Certified (GSOC)
Microsoft Certified: Security Operations Analyst Associate (SC-200)
Splunk Core Certified Power User
AWS Certified Security ‚Äì Specialty
Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP)

CQURE is a provider of specialized IT security services such as advanced penetration testing, security audits, and forensic IT investigations. CQURE experts also conduct conference sessions and training programs for international organizations and top management. additional_module_section:
If your CV catches our attention, the next steps will be as follows:
We will contact you by phone to schedule the first recruitment meeting.
In a video call or a live meeting at the office, you will meet the team manager and discuss the job role‚Äîthis will also be an opportunity to ask questions and get to know each other better.
If you pass the interview successfully, you will most likely receive recruitment tasks to complete.
If we like how you solve the tasks, you can expect a second interview, during which you will meet the CEO.
Finally, you will receive either an offer or a thank-you note with feedback on your participation in the recruitment.

responsibilities_section:

requirements_section:

1+ years of experience delivering data warehouse, data lake, or business intelligence solutions.

Proficient in Python for data-related tasks.
Strong understanding of SQL, including data analysis and working with relational databases (e.g., SQL Server, PostgreSQL).

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Develop and maintain backend applications and systems using Python.
Design and implement efficient and scalable solutions for complex problems.

Collaborate with front-end developers, data engineers, and other team members to deliver end-to-end solutions.

requirements_section:
Our requirements
Proficiency in Python with at least 3-5 years of experience.
Strong understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) and design principles.
Experience with at least one Python web framework such as Django, Flask, or FastAPI.

Familiarity with SQL and relational databases like PostgreSQL or MySQL.

Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Experience with container orchestration tools such as Kubernetes.
Familiarity with asynchronous programming and libraries like Asyncio.
Knowledge of testing frameworks such as Pytest or Unittest.
Exposure to machine learning libraries like TensorFlow or Scikit-Learn.
Experience with GraphQL APIs.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
You can boost your skills and potential in a scaling product
Agile, scrum & lean startup are not just buzzwords ‚Äì a scrum master in every team, and iterative product delivery are standard at Boldare.
Self-organization ‚Äì teams organize their work by themselves. You‚Äôll be engaged in building the product roadmap, sprint planning, etc.
Transparency and feedback. We always share the results of our work and give each other feedback. Everybody here has full access to data (including knowledge bases, project descriptions, metrics, statistics, strategies, even financial data). Also, we communicate via open channels to effectively spread information.
Clients are partners ‚Äì we really care about our relationships with them, and we cooperate as equal partners. There will be no proxies in between your team and the client. Forget about waiting ages for the answer to a simple question - you can expect clear and direct communications.
Face-to-face meetings with clients and the team (which are highly valuable for us). Regular business trips are standard at Boldare. With some partners we meet once a month, with others every six months. The frequency varies, but we care for all team members to participate in onsite meetings.
Adhering to the client‚Äôs technology standards, maintaining the quality of code and solutions, proposing solutions, implementing REST APIs according to the client‚Äôs business needs, collaborating with other roles, writing tests, and working with the client‚Äôs Architects
requirements_section:
Our requirements
5+ years of experience in Java programming
Solid understanding and experience in using Java 17 for software development
Strong knowledge of Spring Boot framework (3.2.x)
Hands-on experience with Docker for creating and managing containerized applications
Proficiency in using Kubernetes for deploying, scaling, and managing containerized applications in a cloud environment
Strong knowledge of PostgreSQL, including schema design, query optimization, and performance tuning
Experience with Redis
Familiarity with OpenAPI (Swagger)
Good understanding of REST API
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools (Git preferably)
Knowledge of Webflux and Reactive Programming
Experience in direct client cooperation and a proactive approach
Fluency in Polish and English (B2+ level) to easily communicate with colleagues
Optional
Familiarity with the process of documenting architecture decisions using ADRs
Experience in designing and developing APIs with an API-first mindset
Knowledge and experience in developing both microservices and modular monolithic architectures
Ability to follow and implement general client technology standards
offered_section:
What we offer
Joining #BoldareTeam, which is a community of open-minded product builders, eager to share their knowledge and best practices
Gaining practical experience and growing in the areas of project management
Dynamic environment where every day brings something new
Chance to work on diverse projects that will help you grow
Real impact on decisions made inside the organization (it‚Äôs not an empty offer, you‚Äôve got it!)
Cooperating with different roles and teams, and possibility to learn from them
Regular feedback and soft skills development
Possibility of receiving a permanent job proposal after internship
A lot of internal & external initiatives where employees share their knowledge and best practices
Biannual Company Celebrations: twice a year, we bring everyone together for a company-wide event. It‚Äôs a great opportunity to unwind and have fun with your coworkers
Anniversary Celebrations: we‚Äôre grateful to have you with us, and we make sure to celebrate every year you‚Äôre here. Reach the 10-year milestone, and you‚Äôll receive a special gift to mark the occasion
Pet-Friendly Office: love bringing your furry friend to work? Our office is pet-friendly, so your four-legged companion is always welcome
Tech Choice: you can choose between a MacBook or a Lenovo laptop, depending on your preference
Flexible working hours (but there are determined core hours)
Great atmosphere and teamwork based on various ways of working face-to-face. Caring for our bold bond, we‚Äôre meeting regularly to spend time together in real life. At online meetings we always have webcams on and find some space for pleasant chitchats
The possibility of hybrid mode. You can work from home, but still, our teams meet regularly at Boldare office and we will need you in the office once a week
Variety of working arrangements (e.g., employment contract/B2B contract, mandate contract)
Preferential terms of Multisport & Lux Med cards
description_block:
Boldare
Scroll to company's profile
Boldare is an Agile-powered company with nearly two decades of international experience in product development and consulting. The company helps clients redefine their industries by building with them the products their users want. Starting in 2004, Boldare now has talents spread across Europe. They have built over 300 digital products for clients around the globe ‚Äì Western and North Europe, the United Kingdom, North America, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and Australia.
additional_module_section:
What does working in Boldare taste like?
Feedback always & everywhere - We are always ready and open to share our thoughts! We do it in our daily work, workshops, 1:1 sessions, etc. This is one of the best tools in our professional growth. We also often share feedback in a team forum, because it‚Äôs great to learn from each other‚Äôs experiences.
Transparency in our DNA - EVERYBODY in Boldare has full access to data, including knowledge bases, project descriptions, metrics, statistics, strategies, even financial data, etc. We almost always communicate with each other via open channels to effectively spread information. This is what you need to make conscious, independent decisions in your role

Britenet Sp. z o.o.
Przewi≈Ñ do profilu firmy
We are Britenet, we have been operating as a leader in providing IT solutions to clients from all over the world since 2006. We focus on growth in international teams, so we create an interdisciplinary environment to encourage development. We support diversity, believing it is the key to creating innovative solutions.
Already trusted by +200 companies from all over the world, among them the largest Polish and international brands representing many industries such as finance, education, energy, automotive, tourism, lottery or insurance.
We take responsibility for the IT sector. We actively collaborate with universities and non-profit organizations and encourage charity activities. We create an open workplace, removing barriers and promoting non-stereotypical thinking about our industry.
We focus on constant development and expertise. Individually tailored training offerings and career paths are a natural approach for us. As #BritePeople, we actively participate in industry conferences and meetups, sharing our expertise with others.
Making people come first. We are proud that many of our #BritePeople choose to join our company for the long term.

SQUARE ONE RESOURCES sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
At Square One Poland we link IT experts with the business. With over 25 years of experience, we specialize in recruitment processes on a global scale. responsibilities_section:

Cloud infrastructure and development:

-Minimum 2 years of commercial, hands-on experience with Google Cloud Platform

-Practical knowledge of CI/CD implementation and automation

-Experience with version control using Git and platforms like GitHub/GitLab

-Independence in problem solving and decision making

Support in certification process from the most advanced Google tools,
2 hours per week for developing your hobbies or spending time with loved ones (work until 3:00 PM on Fridays),

well-matched teams - 96% of our employees are satisfied with working in their teams,

advanced culture of knowledge-sharing

description_block:
SALESTUBE sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
SalesTube is currently the largest martech & e-commerce connected agency in CEE. We build competitive advantages for our clients, brands, and agencies by integrating technological (reselling and implementations), analytical, e-commerce (e-commerce store development), and media (digital media) competencies within a single strategic-execution process. Thanks to our expertise in digital media, data, and technology, which use the universal language of numbers, SalesTube serves over 150 clients across 30 markets.
Want to know more? Visit us at:
WWW: https://salestube.tech/career
Facebooku: https://www.facebook.com/SalesTube
additional_module_section:
What sets us apart:
Martech: we are technologically agnostic. As part of our team, you'll develop your knowledge in technologies such as: Google Marketing Platform, Salesforce, Tealium, Synerise, and many others. You'll have the opportunity to participate in designing and building internal tools - we already have over 30 of them!
Data & analytics: integration, modeling, and activation in performance management. Over 20-person Intelligence Division team combining competencies in data integration, modeling, and activation based on platforms: Google Analytics 360, Adobe, Adform DMP, Tealium, Google Cloud, Salesforce Marketing Cloud, and others.
E-commerce - the strongest one-stop-shop e-commerce agency: we serve 45+ e-commerce brands in areas of: media, analytics, technology, development. Our clients generated over 10% of the entire e-commerce market value in Poland in 2020. Join one of the largest and most experienced teams in digital marketing in the region!
One team - at Group One we have jointly created a unique culture and processes that ensure knowledge exchange and maximum utilization of our competencies' synergy in implementing positive business changes for brands that work with us. This also provides a huge field for developing your competencies.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain backend and frontend applications.
Create and manage databases using PostgreSql.
Develop and maintain frontend applications using React, Material Design.
Manage code repositories using GitHub Actions.

Interest in sustainable and efficient solutions for reducing carbon footprint in the gas and oil industry.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Enterprise Activity Management team is a part of Box's Enterprise Engineering organization. Our main customers are 200K+ enterprise admins, whose responsibilities are to set up and configure Box apps for their enterprises, onboard and migrate users, set rules and permissions for users, groups, files, and folders within their orgs, and run reports. Therefore our team has two major domains: Insights&Reports (I&R), and Users&Groups (U&G).
requirements_section:
Our requirements
3+ years of professional software development experience
Proficient in Java and Spring Boot
Experience designing and developing APIs and microservices
You possess strong knowledge of algorithms, data structures, software design principles, and object-oriented programming
Assess, communicate and complete project milestones with manager and team members in a time sensitive manner
Adapt to the technical and stylistic needs of integrations and projects as they occur; including technical tools, programming languages, technical limitations, and product requirements
Review and assess the technical feasibility of project requirements and propose innovative solutions
Be the technical expert and provide guidance to junior engineers on best practices, coding standards, and complex technical issues
Must speak English proficiently
Optional
Experience in PHP or Scala is a plus
Experience with public cloud systems such as GCP
Experience contributing to open source project
description_block:
Box Poland sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Box is the world‚Äôs leader in Intelligent Content Management. We are trusted by more than 115K organizations around the world today, including nearly 70% of the Fortune 500 and leaders across deeply regulated industries (such as AstraZeneca, JLL, and Nationwide), to protect their data, fuel collaboration, and power critical workflows with secure, enterprise AI.
By joining Box, you will have the unique opportunity to continue driving our platform forward. Content powers how we work. It‚Äôs the billions of files and information flowing across teams, departments, and key business processes every single day: contracts, invoices, employee records, financials, product specs, marketing assets, and more. Our mission is to bring intelligence to the world of content management and empower our customers to completely transform workflows across their organizations. With the combination of AI and enterprise content, the opportunity has never been greater to transform how the world works together and at Box you will be on the front lines of this massive shift.
Founded in 2005, Box is headquartered in Redwood City, CA, and we have offices across the United States, Europe, and Asia.
additional_module_section: Box lives its values, with community and in-person collaboration being a core part of our culture. Boxers are expected to work from their assigned office a minimum of 2 days per week, with a focus on Tuesdays and Thursdays. Your Recruiter will share more about how we work and company culture during the hiring process.

description_block:
Netcompany Poland sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Netcompany was founded in 2000 and has its headquarters in Copenhagen, Denmark. Today, we are an international company with more than 8200 employees working from 10 locations. We serve a wide array of customers in their digital transformation journeys in the public and private sectors across Europe.
At Netcompany we are excited by the challenge of doing things differently. We rely on one another and we develop quickly. From assisting small businesses to undertaking significant government projects, our innovative IT solutions are making a difference. Our culture emphasizes agility and flexibility, with minimal bureaucracy. Take a look at some of our impactful projects here: https://netcompany.com/cases/
As we prepare for new ventures, we are seeking ambitious individuals to join us on this journey.
At Netcompany, we focus on your personal and professional development.
When you join us, you will be assigned a personal mentor who will guide you through your development and assist you in achieving your goals. The close relationship with an experienced colleague ensures your well-being and provides you with concrete insights into the many different career opportunities as you build your experience.
Furthermore, you will participate in our training program, Netcompany Academy, where you will be offered courses and seminars on everything from technologies, and management to communication. All courses are taught by experienced Netcompany colleagues, which ensures that all content is highly relevant and builds upon your expertise, allowing you to be well-prepared to handle various tasks and continually improve throughout your career with us.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
We‚Äôre looking for a mid- to senior-level engineer who‚Äôs equally at home crafting Angular front ends and Java back-end APIs. In this full-time freelance role, you‚Äôll do more than just code; you‚Äôll communicate directly with clients and help shape the architecture of our solutions.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
At least 5 years of professional software development experience, including:
3+ years with Angular
3+ years with Java Spring Boot.
Strong verbal and written English communication skills (B2+ level), with the ability to talk directly with clients in online meetings.
Ability to deliver high-quality service and work independently.
Availability of at least 40 hours per week.
Solid programming fundamentals and understanding of best practices (e.g., DRY, KISS, abstraction, refactoring, optimization, security).
Strong knowledge of Vanilla JavaScript (ES6+).
Advanced proficiency with Angular v18+.
Deep understanding of Dependency Injection and Angular Signals.
Experience with new Angular Control Flow (@if, @for, @switch).
Familiarity with Standalone Components and NgModule-free architecture.
Experience with @defer and performance-focused reactive patterns.
Proficient with RxJS and state management.
Strong command of Java and Spring Boot.
Familiarity with non-relational databases like MongoDB.
Experience building RESTful APIs and working with microservices.
Understanding of Java concurrency and multi-threading.
Experience with testing frameworks like JUnit and Mockito.
Familiarity with Spring Security for authentication and authorization.
Proficiency with build tools such as Maven or Gradle.
Experience with containerization (Docker) and orchestration platforms (e.g., Kubernetes).
Good understanding of logging and monitoring tools for Java apps (e.g., SLF4J, Logback, ELK stack).
Optional
Experience with C++ API development for high-performance services or native integrations.
Familiarity with Carbon Design System or other enterprise-grade component libraries.
offered_section:
What we offer
Freelance opportunity: Enjoy the flexibility of a freelance contract and earn between $25 and $35 USD per hour, depending on your experience and expertise.
Room to grow: We support continuous learning and professional development to help you advance your career.
Make an impact: Your ideas and work will directly influence our direction and help drive meaningful change.
Diverse projects: Work on exciting projects for startups, agencies, and companies based in the US, UK, and Australia.
Work your way: Choose to work from home, your favorite coffee shop, or our Krak√≥w office (we‚Äôve got a nice parking space too!).
Set your schedule: Work the hours that suit you best, as long as there's some overlap with the team and clients.
Transparency: We‚Äôre open and honest about the company‚Äôs decisions, direction, and performance, so you‚Äôre always in the loop.
Supportive team: You‚Äôll never be left alone. Our team is collaborative and always ready to help each other.
Great vibes: Join a team of open-minded, fun, and friendly people who enjoy what they do.
Stay connected: Participate in social events, both online and in person, to stay engaged and build connections.

description_block:
ZOOLA TECH POLAND sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Zoolatech is a Software development company. Now we have around 400 team members in Ukraine, Mexico, Turkey, Poland and we continue to grow.
Zoolatech was founded on the idea of creating a harmonious, collaborative environment for all of our team members and our clients that, once they have discovered it, they will never want to leave. We are building a family-like atmosphere where clients and team members act as partners and share common goals.
Our clients are awesome people who like what they do, so we work hard to make their products incredible. We help them achieve their desires and dreams.
We work with big enterprises and small startups from the USA and Europe. Our customers make the world better in many areas: Retail, Media & Entertainment, Logistics, FinTech, Renewable Energy, Healthcare, Agriculture, Construction & Real Estate, Travel & Hospitality and High Tech.
Mission: Our mission is to create an environment of professionalism and friendliness that will provide an excellent working environment for employees and outstanding service for the clients.
At Zoolatech, everyone creates their own story: it can be about complex architecture, sports, a full and healthy life, or something completely new and exciting that you will bring to us and unite others around it.
We have values that our employees and clients share:
Extreme Ownership
- We own everything within our reach: our work, our results, our relations with coworkers and clients, our careers and professional growth
- We don't blame others and circumstances
- We face challenges, and we‚Äôre not hesitant to ask for help when needed
Learn from Failure
- We love learning and dare to try making things differently and better
- We are smart not to make the same mistake for the second time
- We prefer taking risks and actions to staying still
Speak Up
- We care for what is going on within our reach
- We know we are empowered to make a change
- We do not pretend nothing happens when we see mediocrity, injustice, or plain indifference
Zoola Clients
- We want our clients to be with us forever
- We religiously believe that the only way to our success is our clients success
- We care about the products we work on, and about people who use it
Live a Full, Healthy Life.
- We measure success by the value delivered, not the time spent working
- We care about our physical and mental health
- We believe that happy and healthy people are more productive.

description_block:
ZOOLA TECH POLAND sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Zoolatech is a Software development company. Now we have around 400 team members in Ukraine, Mexico, Turkey, Poland and we continue to grow.
Zoolatech was founded on the idea of creating a harmonious, collaborative environment for all of our team members and our clients that, once they have discovered it, they will never want to leave. We are building a family-like atmosphere where clients and team members act as partners and share common goals.
Our clients are awesome people who like what they do, so we work hard to make their products incredible. We help them achieve their desires and dreams.
We work with big enterprises and small startups from the USA and Europe. Our customers make the world better in many areas: Retail, Media & Entertainment, Logistics, FinTech, Renewable Energy, Healthcare, Agriculture, Construction & Real Estate, Travel & Hospitality and High Tech.
Mission: Our mission is to create an environment of professionalism and friendliness that will provide an excellent working environment for employees and outstanding service for the clients.
At Zoolatech, everyone creates their own story: it can be about complex architecture, sports, a full and healthy life, or something completely new and exciting that you will bring to us and unite others around it.
We have values that our employees and clients share:
Extreme Ownership
- We own everything within our reach: our work, our results, our relations with coworkers and clients, our careers and professional growth
- We don't blame others and circumstances
- We face challenges, and we‚Äôre not hesitant to ask for help when needed
Learn from Failure
- We love learning and dare to try making things differently and better
- We are smart not to make the same mistake for the second time
- We prefer taking risks and actions to staying still
Speak Up
- We care for what is going on within our reach
- We know we are empowered to make a change
- We do not pretend nothing happens when we see mediocrity, injustice, or plain indifference
Zoola Clients
- We want our clients to be with us forever
- We religiously believe that the only way to our success is our clients success
- We care about the products we work on, and about people who use it
Live a Full, Healthy Life.
- We measure success by the value delivered, not the time spent working
- We care about our physical and mental health
- We believe that happy and healthy people are more productive.

description_block:
ITDS Polska Sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
ITDS supports financial service providers to take the next steps.
We identify what‚Äôs possible, every day. Opportunities in the areas of technology, organization, and digitization.
We see where banks, insurers, payment companies, or fintech can go and how they can get there.
That‚Äôs why we want to stimulate you to ramp up your ambition. Forget what you perceive as restraints and step towards the new reality.
ITDS in Poland - Pure player in new Technologies & Financial Industry
+300 IT implementation professionals
+20 clients in the Banking, Insurance, Payment & Fintech Industry
ITDS excels in digital strategy delivery and implementation of best-of-breed lending solutions. ITDS has delivered successful strategic projects throughout Europe since 1998. We combine the experience we‚Äôve accumulated with in-depth knowledge of technologies, business processes, and EU legislation to unlock new business opportunities.

We would like to meet you. If you are interested please apply and attach your CV in English or Polish, including a statement that you agree to our processing and storing of your personal data.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Support the preparation, execution, and follow-up of PI Planning with a focus on your team's contribution,
Contribute to the continuous improvement of the workflow within your team,
Play a significant role in the formation, composition, and development of high-performing teams,
Support employees in the agile environment as part of training to become Agile Coaches,
Contribute to the continuous improvement and further development of performance within the ART (Agile Release Train),
Identify and remove impediments that hinder the team's progress.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Effectively navigated resistance to change and guided teams through successful transitions to agile methodologies,
A strong understanding of team dynamics and the ability to analyze team interactions to address potential conflicts constructively, fostering a collaborative and positive environment,
The ability to communicate effectively with diverse stakeholders, including product owners, developers, and management, to ensure clear understanding, alignment, and manage expectations effectively,
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to proactively identify and resolve roadblocks to team progress,
A solid understanding of Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe),
A proactive approach to identifying areas for improvement and implementing change,
Excellent time management skills and the ability to prioritize tasks effectively to ensure timely delivery of tasks and projects,
Experience in breaking down hierarchical working styles and fostering a collaborative environment,
University degree and are fluent in German and English,
2+ years of experience as a Scrum Master or Agile Coach in a multicultural organization, with expertise in Scaled Agile Framework,
A strong understanding of various agile methodologies and the ability to adapt your approach to different contexts.
Optional
Certifications in Scrum/Agile methodologies,
Experience with Team Building Workshops and Ceremonies Playbook,
Conflict solving skills, ability to support others' professional development and experience in people and team management.
offered_section:
What we offer
Work flexibility - hybrid working model, flexible start of the day, workation, sabbatical leave,
Development and upskilling - our full support during onboarding process, mentoring from experienced colleagues, training sessions, workshops, certification co/financed by PwC and conversations with native speaker,
Wide medical and wellbeing program - medical care package (incl. dental care, freedom of treatment, physiotherapy), coaching, mindfulness, psychological support, education through dedicated webinars and workshops, financial and legal counseling,
Possibility to create your individual benefits package (a.o. lunch pass, insurance packages, concierge, veterinary package for a pet, massages) and access to a cafeteria - vouchers, discounts on IT equipment and car purchase,
3 paid hours for volunteering per month,
Additional paid Birthday Day off,
And when you start enjoying PwC as much as we do, you may recommend your friend to work with us.

position_name: Machine Learning Engineer in Samsung Ads Project
employer_name: Samsung R&D Institute PolandAbout the company
benefit_titles: ['sharing the costs of sports activities', 'private medical care', 'sharing the costs of foreign language classes', 'life insurance', 'corporate products and services at discounted prices', 'integration events', 'dental care', 'no dress code', 'leisure zone', 'pre-paid cards', 'baby layette', 'charity initiatives', 'unlimited free access to Copernicus Science Center', 'mentoring program', 'psychological support', 'possibility to test new Samsung products']
responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Develop, test, deploy, and maintain data, scalable low-latency machine learning products and pipelines supporting ML products considering factors such as the nature of the data, the complexity of the problem, and the available computational resources.
Validate the model's performance on unseen data, ensuring that it generalizes well and does not overfit the training data. Conduct rigorous testing to identify and address potential issues, such as bias or fairness concerns.
Design and develop the next generation machine learning platform to support thousands of model training pipelines concurrently and thousands of billions of daily batch predictions.
Research the latest machine learning platform technologies pushing the boundaries of what is currently possible with ML and keep up-to-date with industry trends and developments.
Experiment with new ML platforms tailored to our environment and create quick prototypes / proof-of-concepts.
Streamline model deployment, unit testing, integration testing, and stress testing and ensure engineering quality.
Support automation of the ML pipeline using CI/CD principles, promoting consistency, reproducibility, and agility.
Work with Data Scientists to introduce new ML platform features, help streamline the model development process, and reduce the lead time for model production.
Closely work with different internal ML teams (e.g., Data Scientists and MLOps teams) to improve codebase and product health.
Depending of your skills and experience you will have a chance to technically lead people
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Degree in Computer Science or related field (Data Science, Big Data, Mathematics, Physics, etc.).
At least 2 years of proven industry experience in machine learning projects.
Strong programming skills in Python and data-science libraries (pandas, scikit-learn).
Working knowledge of SQL and relational databases, ideally Snowflake.
Expert knowledge of data analysis, statistics, data mining, machine learning or Big Data processing area.
Experience with mainstream ML libraries (TensorFlow/PyTorch, Scikit-Learn, PySpark etc.).
Familiarity with data structures, CI/CD pipelines, software engineering principles and robust code testing.
Collaborating in a team using code versioning tools like Git.
Ability to summarize and present the finding results to business/product stakeholders.
Openness to learn new technologies and adapt to technological stack.
Optional
5+ years of industry (or equivalent) experience in designing and implementing machine learning systems.
Experience in the advertising industry, recommendation systems or real-time bidding (RTB) ecosystem.
Experience in leading a group of developers.
Familiarity with AWS tools (e.g. Airflow, SageMaker), Snowflake, Redis, Aerospike, ETL or big data tools (PySpark/Snowpark, Docker, Kubernetes, etc.)
Experience with deploying ML models in production.
Experience with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform), orchestration tools (Airflow), building CI/CD pipelines using Github Actions, and real-time monitoring/alerting frameworks such as Prometheus and Grafana.

Friendly atmosphere focused on teamwork
Wide range of trainings and a huge support in developing algorithmic skills
Opportunity to work in multiple projects
Working with the latest technologies on the market
Monthly integration budget

PC workstation/Laptop + 2 external monitors
Office in Warsaw Spire near Metro station

Attractive relocation package

WHO WE ARE?
ALTEN ‚Äì A Global Leader in Engineering and IT Services

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
As a Java Engineer on the Supply Chain Transportation team, you will be responsible for:
Create frameworks to solve multiple business problems
Responsible for leading design and architecture on projects, write great code
Leads & inspires engineers within the team through design and execution
Takes ownership of solutions, systems, or designs that span multiple people's work, breaking work into smaller tasks for more junior engineers to support.
Influences design within and across teams for projects by providing guidance on software design, development & industry best practices
Diagnose and remedy performance or security issues
Facilitates cross functional troubleshooting, root cause analysis
Surfaces potential design or delivery conflicts in the current product cycle and makes recommendations on the best options.
Demonstrates expertise in industry standards for secure development practices
Expertise with telemetry solutions and products available in the industry
Contributes to community projects and engineering standards
Help mentor junior engineers
requirements_section:
Our requirements
3+ years of professional experience in Java programming language
Strong Knowledge of data structures and distributed systems
Good written and spoken English
Optional
Proficient with Java, Java Spring Boot Framework, and Containerization (Docker/Kubernetes)
Experience with RESTful architecture and microservices
Experience with system design, architecture, scaling and performance testing
Experience with cloud technologies like AWS and/or GCP
Experience with relational and NoSQL databases
Experience with messaging technologies and patterns (Kafka/SQS)
Familiarity with CI/CD, Terraform and testing tools
Strong understanding of computer science fundamentals
Test automation experience at all levels (Unit, Integration, Regression, Load)
Familiarity with ops tools, logging, and metrics (New Relic, Splunk)

description_block:
ZOOLA TECH POLAND sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Zoolatech is a Software development company. Now we have around 400 team members in Ukraine, Mexico, Turkey, Poland and we continue to grow.
Zoolatech was founded on the idea of creating a harmonious, collaborative environment for all of our team members and our clients that, once they have discovered it, they will never want to leave. We are building a family-like atmosphere where clients and team members act as partners and share common goals.
Our clients are awesome people who like what they do, so we work hard to make their products incredible. We help them achieve their desires and dreams.
We work with big enterprises and small startups from the USA and Europe. Our customers make the world better in many areas: Retail, Media & Entertainment, Logistics, FinTech, Renewable Energy, Healthcare, Agriculture, Construction & Real Estate, Travel & Hospitality and High Tech.
Mission: Our mission is to create an environment of professionalism and friendliness that will provide an excellent working environment for employees and outstanding service for the clients.
At Zoolatech, everyone creates their own story: it can be about complex architecture, sports, a full and healthy life, or something completely new and exciting that you will bring to us and unite others around it.
We have values that our employees and clients share:
Extreme Ownership
- We own everything within our reach: our work, our results, our relations with coworkers and clients, our careers and professional growth
- We don't blame others and circumstances
- We face challenges, and we‚Äôre not hesitant to ask for help when needed
Learn from Failure
- We love learning and dare to try making things differently and better
- We are smart not to make the same mistake for the second time
- We prefer taking risks and actions to staying still
Speak Up
- We care for what is going on within our reach
- We know we are empowered to make a change
- We do not pretend nothing happens when we see mediocrity, injustice, or plain indifference
Zoola Clients
- We want our clients to be with us forever
- We religiously believe that the only way to our success is our clients success
- We care about the products we work on, and about people who use it
Live a Full, Healthy Life.
- We measure success by the value delivered, not the time spent working
- We care about our physical and mental health
- We believe that happy and healthy people are more productive.

responsibilities_section:

Tw√≥j zakres obowiƒÖzk√≥w
Scrums. We'll start every day with a scrum, working together to understand responsibilities, identify issues, and communicate priorities.
Collaboration and Communication. You'll be the point person for developers and operations when they need to find a solution quickly. You'll listen to their needs, find a solution and share it. You're comfortable presenting to leadership everything from system designs to new ideas for technology to production incidents.
Code Review. Working in two-week sprints, you'll ensure that code runs through automation scripts with no errors and can automate scale for demand Support. Installation, configuration and administration of various Payroll ,HR, Social Security applications
CI/CD. You'll be part of the team that designs and implements automation to our existing CI/CD tools to help usable products get to market faster through accurate automation.
Variety of work. There is no typical day. You will support applications, checking if something is not working and writing the code it takes to fix it. You must be nimble, adaptable, and flexible.
Change. You're comfortable working on products with old and new technologies. Inevitable challenges will arise, and we'll rely on you to look for a solution. Fail fast, fail safely.

employer_name: Flying Bisons sp. z o.o.About the company
responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
The Flying Digital Content is a part of Flying Bisons Group, specialising in photo and video content production. We collaborate with well-known brands such as HBO Max, Sizeer, 50style, Space Range, My To Sukces, and Glo. Do you know artists like Mata, Kizo, Bia≈Ças, Sok√≥≈Ç, Malik Montana, and Pezet? If your answer is yes, you probably could see our video productions! The portfolio of our clients is getting bigger, and our team of A-players, too!
We're building a curated network of talented freelance Angular Developers that we can call upon for existing and future projects. When you apply to join our freelancer base, you will be evaluated and kept on file. You may not be contacted immediately. When a project matches your specific expertise, you‚Äôll be invited to participate and can choose to accept or decline based on your availability. If you're interested in becoming part of our talent pool, please submit your CV. We‚Äôll get in touch as soon as an opportunity aligned with your skills arises.
Are you self-driven, and dependable professional? If so, we look forward to hearing from you!
requirements_section:
Our requirements
3+ years of commercial experience in Angular development (experience with or a minimum working knowledge of Angular 19)
Proficiency in RxJS and the ability to effectively use reactive programming patterns
Experience with Angular Material or other component libraries
Knowledge of TypeScript, HTML, and CSS (Sass)
Familiarity with Git version control system
Very good command of Polish and English
Optional
Experience with Nx or similar tools
Knowledge of Tailwind CSS
Hands-on experience with Signals and their practical usage
Experience with state management libraries such as NgRx (Signal Store), Akita, or other Redux-based tools
Understanding of WCAG standards and ability to implement accessibility guidelines
Familiarity with Storybook and experience in building and managing Design Systems
description_block:
Flying Bisons sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Flying Bisons is a leading Digital Consulting & Delivery company based in the heart of Europe, Warsaw. Our mission is to help our clients to Unleash Digital Potential‚Ñ¢. We discover, define, design, and develop world-class digital products that drive business results for our clients, shaping digital experiences for millions of people around the world.
We stand out due to our end-to-end process that allows us to approach each and every challenge with confidence that we can deliver the best results. Our expertise includes Research, Digital Strategy, Branding, Content (Written, Photos, Videos), Product Design, Web & Mobile Development, Data Analytics & AI.
Join our 120-people team to co-create industry-defining products and heart-racing experiences for the biggest brands (Mercedes AMG, IKEA, KFC, eObuwie, ≈ªabka, Sanofi, Zain) and disruptive startups (like Booksy, Nethone, Telemedi, or DevSkiller)!
additional_module_section:
Why work with us?
Unleash Your Potential: We don't just encourage growth; we're your partners! Our feedback culture is as regular as your morning coffee.
Routine feedback meetings, feedback workshops, and a well-defined career path ensure a transparent way for continuous development.
Elevate with Flying Spirit: We value a flat structure, allowing you to work directly with experts and report to leaders who are hands-on in projects.
Here, synergetic teamwork is the way we thrive.
Knowledge-sharing meetups, consultations with managers, regular team integrations, and a culture of support are how we roll to provide an environment where you want to grow.
Thriving Partnerships, Boundless Opportunities: With diverse clients and a team, our work is beyond borders.
Whether your location is Poland or Saudi Arabia, you might work for special projects in another country or integrate and network with industry specialists.
Our people: Check our Instagram or YouTube channel to see who the Bisons are!

employer_name: CBRE Business Services Organisation Sp. z o.o.About the company
benefit_titles: ['sharing the costs of sports activities', 'private medical care', 'sharing the costs of foreign language classes', 'sharing the costs of professional training & courses', 'life insurance', 'remote work opportunities', 'flexible working time', 'fruits', 'integration events', 'corporate sports team', 'video games at work', 'coffee / tea', 'leisure zone', 'employee referral program', 'charity initiatives', 'career coach care', 'talent program', 'international enviroment', 'office close to the metro station', 'hybrid work']
responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Design, develop, and optimize complex T-SQL queries, stored procedures, views, and functions for enterprise-grade property and finance systems.
Maintain and enhance our reporting database environment, including ETL pipelines and reporting layers.
Engage with business stakeholders (finance, property management, property management accounting) to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
Ensure adherence to best practices in SQL coding standards, version control, and inline documentation.
Focus on query performance tuning, indexing strategies, and execution plan analysis to ensure optimal database performance.
Proactively identify data quality issues, schema design improvements, and opportunities for automation.
Participate in code reviews, ensuring maintainability, scalability, and adherence to security and governance standards.
Collaborate with analysts, software developers, and data engineers to support wider data initiatives.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Expert-level proficiency in T-SQL and SQL Server environments (SSMS, SSRS, SSIS preferred).
Strong understanding of database normalization, indexing, query optimization, and execution plans.
Proven experience working with large-scale reporting databases, ideally within the property or real estate sector.
Ability to understand and challenge business requirements, translating them into efficient and effective SQL solutions.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills‚Äîable to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical users.
Familiarity with accounting principles or property management systems (e.g., Yardi, MRI, Qube) is advantageous.
Experience with data warehousing concepts, dimensional modeling, or OLAP/OLTP structures, cloud solutions like Snowflake, AWS, Azure is a plus.
ETL tools experience (Alterxy, Savant, PowerQuery, SnapLogic)
Highly self-motivated, detail-oriented, and committed to producing clean, well-commented code.
Organized, able to work independently and effectively manage workload
Ability to exercise judgment based on the analysis of multiple sources of information
Optional
Experience in Agile environments and working in cross-functional product teams.
Understanding of data governance, GDPR, and security in database environments.
Comfortable working in fast-paced environments with changing priorities.
Demonstrated ability to exceed client expectations through proactive problem-solving and strong stakeholder engagement.
Technical experience of MRI, Yardi, YSR reporting skills or another Property Management Systems
Programming experience in Python
offered_section:
What we offer
Stable employment conditions - Work based on employment contract in the international company with stable position on the labour market
Career advancement program - A chance to learn from the Best by attending internal courses and taking part in international programs that will enable you to travel as well as experience how we work in different places in the world. Additionally, we offer a career coach advisory.
Workplace Cultur - Support from our side in terms of working from home as well as comfortable office with chillout room, entertainment room, creative labs and beautiful terrace are making our office a place you want to be. We are well located nearby Wilanowska metro station.
Wellbeing actions - Environment where we care about your wellbeing by health and leisure initiatives (sport interest groups)
Making a Change in the Word surrounding you - Occasion to make an impact by taking part in our initiatives (CSR, ECO friendly approach)
Attractive package of benefits - Private medical healthcare, life insurance, multisport card and MORE
International Environment - Experience growing in multilingual community where diversity is cherished
description_block:
CBRE Business Services Organisation Sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
CBRE Business Services Organisation (CBRE BSO) is a part of CBRE Group, Inc. (NYSE:CBRE), a Fortune 500 and S&P 500 company headquartered in Dallas, is the world‚Äôs largest commercial real estate services and investment firm (based on 2023 revenue). The company has more than 130,000 employees (including Turner & Townsend employees) serving clients in more than 100 countries. CBRE serves a diverse range of clients with an integrated suite of services, including facilities, transaction and project management; property management; investment management; appraisal and valuation; property leasing; strategic consulting; property sales; mortgage services and development services. Please visit our website at www.cbre.com We routinely post important information on our website, including corporate and investor presentations and financial information. We intend to use our website as a means of disclosing material, non-public information and for complying with our disclosure obligations under Regulation FD. Such disclosures will be included in the Investor Relations section of our website at https://ir.cbre.com Accordingly, investors should monitor such portion of our website, in addition to following our press releases, Securities and Exchange Commission filings and public conference calls and webcasts.
additional_module_section:
Why CBRE Business Services Organization (BSO)
When you join CBRE, you become part of the global leader in commercial real estate services and investment that helps businesses and people thrive. We are dynamic problem solvers and forward-thinking professionals who create significant impact. Our collaborative culture is built on our shared values ‚Äî respect, integrity, service and excellence ‚Äî and we value the diverse perspectives, backgrounds and skillsets of our people. At CBRE, you have the opportunity to realize your full potential.
Our Values in Hiring
At CBRE, we are committed to fostering a culture where everyone feels they belong. We value diverse perspectives and experiences, and we welcome all applications.

description_block:
BIT BY BIT Sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
BitByBit Sp. z o.o. is a company specializing in advanced IT solutions for the space sector. Our software supports the management and monitoring of space missions, serving as a key component of the ground segment. We collaborate with the European Space Agency, research institutions, and leading entities in the space sector, delivering innovative solutions in data processing, system optimization, and standardization of space mission management.
Due to constant development and new opportunities related to the project, we are looking for passionate software engineers who are willing to work in the space industry.
The European Space Agency, Airbus, Terma, SpaceBel, and OHB are among our clients.
additional_module_section: Interested? Don‚Äôt hesitate and apply, maybe together we will explore the universe!

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Analyse, understand business and technical requirements and work with clients across different domains and industries
Produce high-quality design deliverables that describe how the solution will accommodate business and technical requirements
Design, develop, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code using the best practices and design patterns
Conduct unit and manual testing and deliver high-quality solutions
Identify bottlenecks, bugs and devise solutions to troubleshoot and address issues.
Work in an agile, international environment with experienced and skilled colleagues in Warsaw and Europe
Plan and organize your own work and accurately report issues and progress in a timely manner
You will get a chance to work with different programming languages and technologies as those vary from project to project, a large part of our tech stack is Java (Java 11/17/21, Spring/Spring Boot, React, NodeJS, Hibernate)
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Graduate (Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs Degree) of Computer Science or other related numerate discipline
Have at least 1 - 3 years of commercial Java development experience after graduation
Good English skills, both spoken and written
Strong understanding of object-oriented programming and data modelling
Familiar with various design, architectural patterns and modern system development
Open towards and able to quickly learn new technologies
offered_section:
What we offer
Scandinavian work environment
Medical Insurance, Life Insurance, Multisport Card
English and Danish language lessons
Drinks, snacks & fruit available at the office
Career development programme for each employee and regular feedback
Internal and external training and certifications
International cooperation with colleagues from Denmark, the Netherlands, Norway, the UK and Vietnam
Attractive office with a view and great location in Warsaw (Metro Wilanowska)
description_block:
Netcompany Poland sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Netcompany was founded in 2000 with the headquarters in Copenhagen, Denmark. Today, we are an international company with more than 8200 employees working from over 10 locations. We serve a wide array of customers in their digital transformation journeys in public and private sectors across Europe.
We are excited by the challenge of doing things differently. At Netcompany we rely on one another and we develop quickly. We are team players. We change societies by creating life-changing IT solutions for variety of customers ‚Äì from small private companies to large projects in the public sector. Our culture builds on low bureaucracy with a strong focus on high agility and flexibility.
Our culture emphasizes minimal bureaucracy. Take a look at some of our impactful projects here: https://netcompany.com/cases/
As we prepare for new ventures, we are seeking ambitious individuals to join us on this journey.
We are excited by the challenge of doing things differently. At Netcompany we rely on one another and we develop quickly. We are team players. We change societies by creating life-changing IT solutions for variety of customers ‚Äì from small private companies to large projects in the public sector. Our culture builds on low bureaucracy with a strong focus on high agility and flexibility.
additional_module_section:
Be a part of an inclusive community
At Netcompany, we prioritise community highly. We actively promote an open and welcoming work culture that is built on collaboration and trust, and where there is always room for mutual sparring and support.
It is part of our culture and values that all employees, irrespective of backgrounds, identities, and experiences, are met with understanding and respect, as well as equal opportunities for development and well-being.
You will have the opportunity to learn and collaborate with colleagues from various cultures and nationalities, as we are an international company with offices in many countries.
We provide a shared environment where we engage with each other across departments and projects. Additionally, we offer a wide range of social and professional events that provide you with the best opportunities to expand and build a network already early in your career.

employer_name: CQURE SP√ì≈ÅKA Z OGRANICZONƒÑ ODPOWIEDZIALNO≈öCIƒÑAbout the company
responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Proactively hunt for advanced persistent threats (APTs), malware, and insider threats within enterprise environments.
Analyze security telemetry from various sources, including SIEM, EDR, XDR, and cloud security tools to detect and investigate anomalies.
Develop and optimize hunting queries, detections, and automation in SIEMs and threat-hunting platforms.
Conduct forensic investigations on suspicious activity, using logs, memory analysis, and behavioral analytics.
Leverage threat intelligence to correlate security incidents and improve detection strategies.
Collaborate with incident response (IR) teams to remediate and mitigate threats.
Identify gaps in security monitoring, recommend improvements, and implement threat detection enhancements.
Research and implement new hunting methodologies based on emerging threats and attacker tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs).
Develop detection rules, scripts, and custom SIEM queries to improve security monitoring.
Document threat-hunting findings, create reports, and present to stakeholders.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
‚Ä¢ 6+ years of experience in providing cybersecurity services or training,
‚Ä¢ Expert level IT skills and knowledge (cybersecurity),
‚Ä¢ Vast experience in IT infrastructure management, deployment and testing,
‚Ä¢ Interest in IT security, cloud solutions, network security and server administration technologies,
‚Ä¢ Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology or related field of study,
‚Ä¢ English (at least B2 level).
Work Environment & Expectations:
‚Ä¢ Ability to work in a 24/7 SOC or threat-hunting team as required.
‚Ä¢ Flexibility to adapt to evolving cyber threats and changing hunting techniques.
‚Ä¢ Strong desire for continuous learning and staying updated with cyber threat intelligence.

‚Ä¢ Microsoft Sentinel

‚Ä¢ Chronicle SIEM (Google Cloud)
‚Ä¢ LogRhythm

Threat Hunting & Detection Platforms:

‚Ä¢ Microsoft Defender XDR
‚Ä¢ CrowdStrike Falcon Insight
‚Ä¢ Palo Alto Cortex XDR
‚Ä¢ SentinelOne Singularity
‚Ä¢ Elastic Security (Kibana queries for threat hunting)

‚Ä¢ RSA NetWitness
Cloud Security & Monitoring:
‚Ä¢ Azure Security Center & Defender for Cloud

‚Ä¢ Google Chronicle & Security Command Center
‚Ä¢ Cisco SecureX
Threat Intelligence & Forensic Tools:

‚Ä¢ Volatility etc.

CQURE is a provider of specialized IT security services such as advanced penetration testing, security audits, and forensic IT investigations. additional_module_section:
If your CV catches our attention, the next steps will be as follows:
We will contact you by phone to schedule the first recruitment meeting.
In a video call or a live meeting at the office, you will meet the team manager and discuss the job role‚Äîthis will also be an opportunity to ask questions and get to know each other better.
If you pass the interview successfully, you will most likely receive recruitment tasks to complete.
If we like how you solve the tasks, you can expect a second interview, during which you will meet the CEO.
Finally, you will receive either an offer or a thank-you note with feedback on your participation in the recruitment.
