responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Develop and maintain backend applications and systems using Python.
Design and implement efficient and scalable solutions for complex problems.
Integrate with third-party APIs and back-end services.
Write reusable, testable, and efficient code.
Collaborate with front-end developers, data engineers, and other team members to deliver end-to-end solutions.
Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to best practices.
Optimize application performance and troubleshoot system issues.
Work on the development of RESTful APIs and data pipelines.
Stay updated with the latest Python frameworks and libraries.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Proficiency in Python with at least 3-5 years of experience.
Strong understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) and design principles.
Experience with at least one Python web framework such as Django, Flask, or FastAPI.
Solid knowledge of RESTful APIs and microservices architecture.
Familiarity with SQL and relational databases like PostgreSQL or MySQL.
Experience with version control systems, particularly Git.
Understanding of CI/CD pipelines and working with tools like Docker.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Good communication and collaboration skills.
Optional
Experience with data processing frameworks like Pandas or NumPy.
Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform.
Knowledge of NoSQL databases like MongoDB or Redis.
Experience with container orchestration tools such as Kubernetes.
Familiarity with asynchronous programming and libraries like Asyncio.
Knowledge of testing frameworks such as Pytest or Unittest.
Exposure to machine learning libraries like TensorFlow or Scikit-Learn.
Experience with GraphQL APIs.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
You can boost your skills and potential in a scaling product
Agile, scrum & lean startup are not just buzzwords ‚Äì a scrum master in every team, and iterative product delivery are standard at Boldare.
Self-organization ‚Äì teams organize their work by themselves. You‚Äôll be engaged in building the product roadmap, sprint planning, etc.
Transparency and feedback. We always share the results of our work and give each other feedback. Everybody here has full access to data (including knowledge bases, project descriptions, metrics, statistics, strategies, even financial data). Also, we communicate via open channels to effectively spread information.
Clients are partners ‚Äì we really care about our relationships with them, and we cooperate as equal partners. There will be no proxies in between your team and the client. Forget about waiting ages for the answer to a simple question - you can expect clear and direct communications.
Face-to-face meetings with clients and the team (which are highly valuable for us). Regular business trips are standard at Boldare. With some partners we meet once a month, with others every six months. The frequency varies, but we care for all team members to participate in onsite meetings.
Adhering to the client‚Äôs technology standards, maintaining the quality of code and solutions, proposing solutions, implementing REST APIs according to the client‚Äôs business needs, collaborating with other roles, writing tests, and working with the client‚Äôs Architects
requirements_section:
Our requirements
5+ years of experience in Java programming
Solid understanding and experience in using Java 17 for software development
Strong knowledge of Spring Boot framework (3.2.x)
Hands-on experience with Docker for creating and managing containerized applications
Proficiency in using Kubernetes for deploying, scaling, and managing containerized applications in a cloud environment
Strong knowledge of PostgreSQL, including schema design, query optimization, and performance tuning
Experience with Redis
Familiarity with OpenAPI (Swagger)
Good understanding of REST API
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools (Git preferably)
Knowledge of Webflux and Reactive Programming
Experience in direct client cooperation and a proactive approach
Fluency in Polish and English (B2+ level) to easily communicate with colleagues
Optional
Familiarity with the process of documenting architecture decisions using ADRs
Experience in designing and developing APIs with an API-first mindset
Knowledge and experience in developing both microservices and modular monolithic architectures
Ability to follow and implement general client technology standards
offered_section:
What we offer
Joining #BoldareTeam, which is a community of open-minded product builders, eager to share their knowledge and best practices
Gaining practical experience and growing in the areas of project management
Dynamic environment where every day brings something new
Chance to work on diverse projects that will help you grow
Real impact on decisions made inside the organization (it‚Äôs not an empty offer, you‚Äôve got it!)
Cooperating with different roles and teams, and possibility to learn from them
Regular feedback and soft skills development
Possibility of receiving a permanent job proposal after internship
A lot of internal & external initiatives where employees share their knowledge and best practices
Biannual Company Celebrations: twice a year, we bring everyone together for a company-wide event. It‚Äôs a great opportunity to unwind and have fun with your coworkers
Anniversary Celebrations: we‚Äôre grateful to have you with us, and we make sure to celebrate every year you‚Äôre here. Reach the 10-year milestone, and you‚Äôll receive a special gift to mark the occasion
Pet-Friendly Office: love bringing your furry friend to work? Our office is pet-friendly, so your four-legged companion is always welcome
Tech Choice: you can choose between a MacBook or a Lenovo laptop, depending on your preference
Flexible working hours (but there are determined core hours)
Great atmosphere and teamwork based on various ways of working face-to-face. Caring for our bold bond, we‚Äôre meeting regularly to spend time together in real life. At online meetings we always have webcams on and find some space for pleasant chitchats
The possibility of hybrid mode. You can work from home, but still, our teams meet regularly at Boldare office and we will need you in the office once a week
Variety of working arrangements (e.g., employment contract/B2B contract, mandate contract)
Preferential terms of Multisport & Lux Med cards
description_block:
Boldare
Scroll to company's profile
Boldare is an Agile-powered company with nearly two decades of international experience in product development and consulting. The company helps clients redefine their industries by building with them the products their users want. Starting in 2004, Boldare now has talents spread across Europe. They have built over 300 digital products for clients around the globe ‚Äì Western and North Europe, the United Kingdom, North America, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and Australia.
additional_module_section:
What does working in Boldare taste like?
Feedback always & everywhere - We are always ready and open to share our thoughts! We do it in our daily work, workshops, 1:1 sessions, etc. This is one of the best tools in our professional growth. We also often share feedback in a team forum, because it‚Äôs great to learn from each other‚Äôs experiences.
Transparency in our DNA - EVERYBODY in Boldare has full access to data, including knowledge bases, project descriptions, metrics, statistics, strategies, even financial data, etc. We almost always communicate with each other via open channels to effectively spread information. This is what you need to make conscious, independent decisions in your role

Britenet Sp. z o.o.
Przewi≈Ñ do profilu firmy
We are Britenet, we have been operating as a leader in providing IT solutions to clients from all over the world since 2006. We focus on growth in international teams, so we create an interdisciplinary environment to encourage development. We support diversity, believing it is the key to creating innovative solutions.
Already trusted by +200 companies from all over the world, among them the largest Polish and international brands representing many industries such as finance, education, energy, automotive, tourism, lottery or insurance.
We take responsibility for the IT sector. We actively collaborate with universities and non-profit organizations and encourage charity activities. We create an open workplace, removing barriers and promoting non-stereotypical thinking about our industry.
We focus on constant development and expertise. Individually tailored training offerings and career paths are a natural approach for us. As #BritePeople, we actively participate in industry conferences and meetups, sharing our expertise with others.
Making people come first. We are proud that many of our #BritePeople choose to join our company for the long term.

SQUARE ONE RESOURCES sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
At Square One Poland we link IT experts with the business. With over 25 years of experience, we specialize in recruitment processes on a global scale. responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Cloud infrastructure and development:
Designing and implementing serverless solutions (Cloud Run, Cloud Functions, API Gateway)
Managing cloud storage services (Google Cloud Storage, Firestore)
Developing and maintaining data processing pipelines (Pub/Sub, BigQuery, Dataflow)
Creating and optimizing Python applications with modern frameworks (Flask/FastAPI)
Defining infrastructure as code using Terraform
Setting up comprehensive observability solutions (Cloud Logging, Monitoring, Error Reporting)
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Technical requirements:
-Minimum 2 years of commercial, hands-on experience with Google Cloud Platform
-Proficiency with Google Cloud SDK (gcloud) and APIs
-Advanced Python skills with libraries like pandas, selenium, asyncio, and Flask/FastAPI
-Practical knowledge of CI/CD implementation and automation
-Practical experience with ETL services in GCP environment
-Experience with version control using Git and platforms like GitHub/GitLab
Behavioral requirements:
-Strong teamwork capabilities and collaboration mindset
-Eagerness to continuously learn new technologies
-Independence in problem solving and decision making
-Ability to read and understand code written by others quickly
Optional
Experience with Kubernetes and container orchestration
Knowledge of configuration management tools (Ansible, Puppet, Chef)
Advanced SQL skills for BigQuery
Experience with Grafana/Prometheus for enhanced monitoring
Experience with web automation and data scraping using Selenium
offered_section:
What we offer
Support in certification process from the most advanced Google tools,
2 hours per week for developing your hobbies or spending time with loved ones (work until 3:00 PM on Fridays),
Hybrid work model - true and flexible ;)
Pet-friendly office - feel free to take your pet to our office
well-matched teams - 96% of our employees are satisfied with working in their teams,
Free access to the language platform (eTutor) - you can learn English or German,
Unlimited access to the EAP platform to take care for your mental well-being,
Private medical care and a MultiSport card,
Organizational involvement in climate action - check out our Declaration with WWF Poland,
advanced culture of knowledge-sharing
Internally developed evaluation system: development discussions, a clear career path, individual approach, and the possibility of changing specialization,
Additional benefits for employees with at least 5 years seniority (+10 more days off, high insurance coverage),
Baby bonus for new parents,
Development program - People Manager,
Employment contract - after the 3-months trial period, we will offer you a permanent contract,
Onboarding program and Buddy to facilitate a quick start,
Parking for bikes, gaming room.
description_block:
SALESTUBE sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
SalesTube is currently the largest martech & e-commerce connected agency in CEE. We build competitive advantages for our clients, brands, and agencies by integrating technological (reselling and implementations), analytical, e-commerce (e-commerce store development), and media (digital media) competencies within a single strategic-execution process. Thanks to our expertise in digital media, data, and technology, which use the universal language of numbers, SalesTube serves over 150 clients across 30 markets.
Want to know more? Visit us at:
WWW: https://salestube.tech/career
Facebooku: https://www.facebook.com/SalesTube
additional_module_section:
What sets us apart:
Martech: we are technologically agnostic. As part of our team, you'll develop your knowledge in technologies such as: Google Marketing Platform, Salesforce, Tealium, Synerise, and many others. You'll have the opportunity to participate in designing and building internal tools - we already have over 30 of them!
Data & analytics: integration, modeling, and activation in performance management. Over 20-person Intelligence Division team combining competencies in data integration, modeling, and activation based on platforms: Google Analytics 360, Adobe, Adform DMP, Tealium, Google Cloud, Salesforce Marketing Cloud, and others.
E-commerce - the strongest one-stop-shop e-commerce agency: we serve 45+ e-commerce brands in areas of: media, analytics, technology, development. Our clients generated over 10% of the entire e-commerce market value in Poland in 2020. Join one of the largest and most experienced teams in digital marketing in the region!
One team - at Group One we have jointly created a unique culture and processes that ensure knowledge exchange and maximum utilization of our competencies' synergy in implementing positive business changes for brands that work with us. This also provides a huge field for developing your competencies.

employer_name: SQUARE ONE RESOURCES sp. z o.o.About the company
responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain backend and frontend applications.
Create and manage databases using PostgreSql.
Develop and maintain frontend applications using React, Material Design.
Manage code repositories using GitHub Actions.
Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions.
Deploy applications to AWS.
Work in a 'you-build-it-you-run-it' mentality.
Work on sustainable and efficient solutions to reduce our carbon footprint in the gas and oil industry.
Work in globally distributed teams.
Look with your feet. Go and see. Travel if needed.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Minimum of 3 years of experience as a Software Developer.
Strong understanding of Python, React, Material Design, and PostgreSql.
Experience with NumPy/SciPy.
Experience with end-to-end testing using Playwright.
Experience with code repositories such as GitHub Actions.
Experience with pipeline tools such as GitHub Actions.
Experience with AWS infrastructure.
Experience with task management tools such as Jira.
Experience with documentation tools such as Confluence.
Interest in sustainable and efficient solutions for reducing carbon footprint in the gas and oil industry.
description_block:
SQUARE ONE RESOURCES sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
At Square One Poland we link IT experts with the business. With over 25 years of experience, we specialize in recruitment processes on a global scale. Despite years of experience, we still have a startup DNA and this is our advantage. Our offices are located in London and Warsaw, however, we can reach clients from all over the world, from start-ups to big worldwide corporations.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Supports relationship with product owners to gather and refine requirements for one product task, adding and taking into account existing tools and solutions within a product.
Begins to develop and design architect solutions, considering integrations with other solutions.
Provides relevant knowledge on the development of technical documentation of solutions and follows best practices in technical documentation.
Plays a role in the development and delivery of new features within a product.
Design code and systems that touch 40% of the world population while influencing Visa‚Äôs internal standards for scalability, security, and reusability
Collaborate cross-functionally to create design artifacts and develop best-in-class software solutions for multiple Visa technical offerings
Actively contribute to product quality improvements, value added service technology, and new business flows in diverse agile squads
Develop robust and scalable products intended for a myriad of customers including end-user merchants, b2b, and business to government solutions
Leverage innovative technologies to build the next generation of Payment Services, Transaction Platforms, Real-Time Payments, and Buy Now Pay Later Technology
Opportunities to make a difference on a global or local scale through mentorship and continued learning opportunities
requirements_section:
Our requirements
University degree and approximately 1-2 years of experience on similar position.
Web Browser Optimization: The ability to select the ‚Äòbest available‚Äô values of some objective function to improve the functional effectiveness of web browsers.
User Interface Design: Knowledge of user interface design, which is the interaction where users and computers interact. This includes an understanding of how to provide an optimal industrial design experience through User Interface (UI) Design.
Back-end Programming Languages: Knowledge of and ability to develop back-end (Java) code in support of package and product development. This includes the extension of capabilities of packages and products.
API Generation: The ability to develop and utilize Application Program Interfaces (APIs), a set of routines, protocols, and tools for building software applications that specify how software components should interact and are used when programming graphical user interface (GUI) components. An API may be for a web-based system, operating system, database system, computer hardware, or software library.
description_block:
VISA
Scroll to company's profile
Visa is a world leader in payments and technology, with over 259 billion payments transactions flowing safely between consumers, merchants, financial institutions, and government entities in more than 200 countries and territories each year. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable, and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive while driven by a common purpose ‚Äì to uplift everyone, everywhere by being the best way to pay and be paid.
Make an impact with a purpose-driven industry leader. Join us today and experience Life at Visa.
Visa‚Äôs Technology Organization is a community of problem solvers and innovators reshaping the future of commerce. We operate the world‚Äôs most sophisticated processing networks capable of handling more than 65k secure transactions a second across 80M merchants, 15k Financial Institutions, and billions of everyday people. While working with us you‚Äôll get to work on complex distributed systems and solve massive scale problems centered on new payment flows, business and data solutions, cyber security, and B2C platforms.
additional_module_section:
The Skills You Bring:
Energy and Experience: A growth mindset that is curious and passionate about technologies and enjoys challenging projects on a global scale
Challenge the Status Quo: Comfort in pushing the boundaries, ‚Äòhacking‚Äô beyond traditional solutions
Builder: Experience building and deploying modern services and web applications with quality and scalability
Learner: Constant drive to learn new technologies such as Angular, React, Kubernetes, Docker, etc.
Partnership: Experience collaborating with Product, Test, Dev-ops, and Agile/Scrum teams

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Supports relationship with product owners to gather and refine requirements for one product task, adding and taking into account existing tools and solutions within a product.
Begins to develop and design architect solutions, considering integrations with other solutions.
Provides relevant knowledge on the development of technical documentation of solutions and follows best practices in technical documentation.
Plays a role in the development and delivery of new features within a product.
Design code and systems that touch 40% of the world population while influencing Visa‚Äôs internal standards for scalability, security, and reusability.
Collaborate cross-functionally to create design artifacts and develop best-in-class software solutions for multiple Visa technical offerings.
Actively contribute to product quality improvements, value added service technology, and new business flows in diverse agile squads.
Develop robust and scalable products intended for a myriad of customers including end-user merchants, b2b, and business to government solutions.
Leverage innovative technologies to build the next generation of Payment Services, Transaction Platforms, Real-Time Payments, and Buy Now Pay Later Technology.
Opportunities to make a difference on a global or local scale through mentorship and continued learning opportunities.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Bachelor's degree, OR 3+ years of relevant work experience.
Associate: 2 or more years of work experience.
Knowledge of and ability to develop back-end (.NET, C#, SQL, MongoDB or Kafka, CI/CD) code in support of package and product development. This includes the extension of capabilities of packages and products.
The ability to develop and utilize Application Program Interfaces (APIs), a set of routines, protocols, and tools for building software applications that specify how software components should interact and are used when programming graphical user interface (GUI) components. An API may be for a web-based system, operating system, database system, computer hardware, or software library.
Knowledge of and the ability to use database software (e.g., applications, web-based applications, information systems) to maintain, modify, and output data.
Knowledge of systems integration process in which separately produced components or subsystems are combined and problems in their interactions are addressed.
Knowledge of data structures, which consist of data organization, management, and storage formats that enable efficient access and modifications. This includes a collection of data values, the relationships among them, and the functions or operations that can be applied to the data.
Willingness to learn and work with technologies such as ServiceNow and/or Microsoft Dynamics.
Full proficiency in the English language - B2 or higher (mandatory requirement).
description_block:
VISA
Scroll to company's profile
Visa is a world leader in payments and technology, with over 259 billion payments transactions flowing safely between consumers, merchants, financial institutions, and government entities in more than 200 countries and territories each year. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable, and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive while driven by a common purpose ‚Äì to uplift everyone, everywhere by being the best way to pay and be paid.
Make an impact with a purpose-driven industry leader. Join us today and experience Life at Visa.
Visa‚Äôs Technology Organization is a community of problem solvers and innovators reshaping the future of commerce. We operate the world‚Äôs most sophisticated processing networks capable of handling more than 65k secure transactions a second across 80M merchants, 15k Financial Institutions, and billions of everyday people. While working with us you‚Äôll get to work on complex distributed systems and solve massive scale problems centered on new payment flows, business and data solutions, cyber security, and B2C platforms.
additional_module_section:
The Skills You Bring:
Energy and Experience: A growth mindset that is curious and passionate about technologies and enjoys challenging projects on a global scale
Challenge the Status Quo: Comfort in pushing the boundaries, ‚Äòhacking‚Äô beyond traditional solutions
Language Expertise: Expertise in development language .NET
Builder: Experience building and deploying modern services and web applications with quality and scalability
Learner: Willingness to learn technologies such as ServiceNow and/or Microsoft Dynamics.
Partnership: Experience collaborating with Product, Test, Dev-ops, and Agile/Scrum teams

description_block:
CONSCENSIA POLAND sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Conscensia ‚Äì a Danish software development company with headquarters in Aalborg (Denmark) and development centers in Lviv (Ukraine), Warsaw (Poland) and in Porto (Portugal). Today the company has more than 18 years of experience in helping companies to create the best software solutions for their businesses.
At Conscensia, you‚Äôll have the unique opportunity to work as part of our team while contributing to innovative projects for our trusted clients. This position is for a project with Frey Commodities, where you‚Äôll collaborate closely with the customer‚Äôs team while enjoying all the benefits and support of being a Conscensia colleague
additional_module_section:
About Frey (The Customer):
We optimise containerized agricultural commodity flows by unifying diverse global expertise and backgrounds with an ambition for growth and a strong belief in simple, digital, and transparent trading of commodities providing affordable possibilities for any kind of business. We are entrepreneurs with advanced expertise in trading, logistics, and data that utilise technology and great minds to connect local businesses with suppliers across the globe, enabling new access and opportunity to markets, materials, and products. In short, we make commodity trading easy, efficient, and affordable. By living our values of being Trustworthy, Rethinking, Ambitious, Data-driven, and Entrepreneurial, we rethink commodity trading and logistics and build a culture of empowering our employees to challenge the status quo and make a smarter move.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
You are about to join a group of talented and savvy JavaScript Developers to build well-designed, user-centered apps for our foreign clients.
You‚Äôre excited about working closely with Product Designers, Backend Developers, Scrum Masters and QAs (they are your new best friends now!).
Developing complex products in an ‚ÄúA-Z manner‚Äù is what you desire (we‚Äôre not code-monkeys!). You are willing to propose outcomes apart from just implementing them.
Agile, scrum & lean startup are not just buzzwords ‚Äì no project managers, a scrum master in every team, and iterative product delivery are standard at Boldare.
Code review and using best practices (TDD, BDD etc.) are the habits you cannot live without.
Self-organization ‚Äì there are no managers in Boldare, so the teams organize their work by themselves. You‚Äôll be engaged in building the product roadmap, sprint planning, etc.
Direct impact on the product & tech stack ‚Äì our scrum teams are responsible not only for performing tasks but also for proposing technical solutions. You‚Äôre the expert here, so we trust in your tech recommendations.
Clients are partners ‚Äì we really care about our relationships with them, and we cooperate as equal partners. There will be no proxies in between your team and the client. Forget about waiting ages for the answer to a simple question - you can expect clear and direct communications.
Face-to-face meetings with clients and the team (which are highly valuable for us). Regular business trips are standard at Boldare. With some partners we meet once a month, with others every six months. The frequency varies, but we care for all team members to participate in onsite meetings.
Transparency and feedback. We always share the results of our work and give each other feedback. Everybody here has full access to data (including knowledge bases, project descriptions, metrics, statistics, strategies, even financial data). Also, we communicate via open channels to effectively spread information.
Great atmosphere and teamwork based on various ways of working face-to-face. Caring for our bold bond, we‚Äôre meeting regularly to spend time together in real life. At online meetings we always have webcams on and find some space for pleasant chitchats.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
2+ years of experience in developing JS applications using Vue.js and React
Commercial experience with Vue 2 and Composition API
Practice in Typescript
Proficient understanding of Git
Strong knowledge of REST API design
Experience with Vuetify
Knowledge of Agile development methodologies (Scrum preferably)
Experience with direct cooperation with external client
Command of English and Polish on B2+ level
Openness to business trips and face-to-face meetings with the team
Optional
Practical experience with Next
Experience with Jest
Experience with Pinia
offered_section:
What we offer
Joining #BoldareTeam, which is a community of open-minded product builders, eager to share their knowledge and best practices
Gaining practical experience and growing in the areas of project management
Dynamic environment where every day brings something new
Chance to work on diverse projects that will help you grow
Real impact on decisions made inside the organization (it‚Äôs not an empty offer, you‚Äôve got it!)
Cooperating with different roles and teams, and possibility to learn from them
Regular feedback and soft skills development
Possibility of receiving a permanent job proposal after internship
A lot of internal & external initiatives where employees share their knowledge and best practices
Biannual Company Celebrations: twice a year, we bring everyone together for a company-wide event. It‚Äôs a great opportunity to unwind and have fun with your coworkers
Anniversary Celebrations: we‚Äôre grateful to have you with us, and we make sure to celebrate every year you‚Äôre here. Reach the 10-year milestone, and you‚Äôll receive a special gift to mark the occasion
Pet-Friendly Office: love bringing your furry friend to work? Our office is pet-friendly, so your four-legged companion is always welcome
Tech Choice: you can choose between a MacBook or a Lenovo laptop, depending on your preference
Flexible working hours (but there are determined core hours)
Great atmosphere and teamwork based on various ways of working face-to-face. Caring for our bold bond, we‚Äôre meeting regularly to spend time together in real life. At online meetings we always have webcams on and find some space for pleasant chitchats
The possibility of hybrid mode. You can work from home, but still, our teams meet regularly at Boldare office and we will need you in the office once a week
Variety of working arrangements (e.g., employment contract/B2B contract, mandate contract)
Preferential terms of Multisport & Lux Med cards
description_block:
Boldare
Scroll to company's profile
Boldare is an Agile-powered company with nearly two decades of international experience in product development and consulting. The company helps clients redefine their industries by building with them the products their users want. Starting in 2004, Boldare now has talents spread across Europe. They have built over 300 digital products for clients around the globe ‚Äì Western and North Europe, the United Kingdom, North America, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and Australia.
additional_module_section:
What does working in Boldare taste like?
Feedback always & everywhere - We are always ready and open to share our thoughts! We do it in our daily work, workshops, 1:1 sessions, etc. This is one of the best tools in our professional growth. We also often share feedback in a team forum, because it‚Äôs great to learn from each other‚Äôs experiences.
Transparency in our DNA - EVERYBODY in Boldare has full access to data, including knowledge bases, project descriptions, metrics, statistics, strategies, even financial data, etc. We almost always communicate with each other via open channels to effectively spread information. This is what you need to make conscious, independent decisions in your role

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Maintain and control material, customer and pricing master data in SAP ERP as instructed by the local BU and established procedures, keeping on target the key performance metrics (quality, speed, compliance).
Prepare data reports and analyses using SAP ERP, MS Excel and other internal tools, and share them as requested with the local BU and the CDO Leadership.
Perform root-cause analysis of data quality defects and propose and implement actions that correct the data and prevent defect recurrence.
Challenge existing work processes and propose and implement improvements (with Team Leader‚Äôs support as needed).
Contribute to the regular connects with your team and the local BU by providing requested information, sharing ideas, and proactively report MD-related business risks.
Create, review, and update internal documentation that contains standard operating procedures and work instructions.
Obtain, store, and deliver information for audit purposes.
Train less experienced team members and local BU requestors on master data processes in your scope of work.
Support CDO Project Management team in the delivery of business projects by sharing detailed information on master data processes in your scope of work.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Min. 1 year of working experience in data management, supply chain, finance, customer service or IT
Practical knowledge of SAP ERP or other data management systems
Ability to conduct data analyses with attention to detail, and to present conclusions in a logical, informative way
Ownership, autonomy, and accountability for results within the given scope
Growth mindset, with focus on solutions, improvements, and constant learning
Priority-setting skills and efficient work organization in a dynamic business environment
Resilience to frequent changes in the supply chain
Ability to think and understand quickly, and to adjust plans and actions to the changing circumstances
Ability to communicate effectively and work as part of a team towards a common objective
Fluent English, both written and spoken
Good level of German (min. intermediate)
Good practical knowledge of MS Office tools, especially Excel

At the heart of our company is a commitment to nurturing growth, health, and happiness. That‚Äôs why we offer:

Quarterly and annual recognition program that comes with financial rewards.
Comprehensive Luxmed medical coverage.
Life insurance to keep you and your loved ones protected.
A lunch card to fuel your productivity.
A Multisport card to keep you active and healthy.
Support for your commute (public transport).
Exciting product gifts four times a year and opportunities to sample new products.
Funding for team bonding and integration activities.
Bonuses for life‚Äôs special moments (like marriage or the birth of a child) and for long-term service.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Plan and execute manual test cases based on specifications and user stories
Collaborate with developers, and clients to ensure clear understanding of requirements and quality goals
Identify, report, and track bugs and issues using tools like JIRA
Maintain and update test documentation (e.g., test plans, test cases, test reports)
Participate in client meetings and provide quality insights and feedback
Proactively suggest improvements to QA processes and product quality
requirements_section:
Our requirements
3+ years of experience in manual software testing
Strong communication skills and a proactive mindset
Very good command of English (min. B2/C1)
Experience with tools such as JIRA, Confluence or similar
Ability to work independently and manage priorities
Optional
Experience with laboratory systems (e.g., LIMS)
Educational background in biotechnology, bioinformatics, or related fields
offered_section:
What we offer
You will become a part of a stable and well-organized company
You will work in a friendly atmosphere from a well-located office in Wroclaw or from home, so you can focus on creating and developing great things in the environment you like!
We focus on your growth - not only in theory! We organize and finance (as a part of the training budget) both internal and external training, conferences, and hackathons.
You can also be involved in developing career paths in the company.
We guarantee an individual path of professional development, instead of a cookie-cutter approach.
We prefer long-term cooperation. After the project is finished, we talk and create a further action plan together.
Each of our employees can benefit from individual consultations with coaches and business psychologists as part of the HearMe platform.
Something else? Of course! We provide co-financing of language learning and a social package (MultiSport, private medical care).
And besides... we are a group of people with different passions who simply like to spend time together - not only at work. An evening out with board games & beer, a company beach party, or a weekend in the mountains is not a duty but a pleasure for us! Come to us and discover it by yourself! üòä

Micro Solutions Sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
We are Micro Solutions - instead of corporate structures and formalism we prefer a friendly atmosphere, individual approach, and, above all, interesting challenges from various fields (mainly medical, but not only), which make us stay motivated and full of energy even without coffee. We are looking to expand our team with another person!
